name: Wriothesley
source: Reward for inviting Wriothesley to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

skills.name: Icefang Rush
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>. This character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>Chilling Penalty</color>.
skills.description: Deals 2 Cryo DMG. This character gains Chilling Penalty.

skills.name: Darkgold Wolfbite
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C111112]</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When this character takes DMG or is healed 2 times in total this Round:</color> This Skill costs 1 less Elemental Die (Cost can be reduced by up to 2).
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>, creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Lingering Icicles</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When this character takes DMG or is healed 2 times in total this Round:</color> This Skill costs 1 less Elemental Die (Cost can be reduced by up to 2).
skills.description:
Deals 2 Cryo DMG, creates 1 Lingering Icicles.
When this character takes DMG or is healed 2 times in total this Round: This Skill costs 1 less Elemental Die (Cost can be reduced by up to 2).
